issue.title: mytotalconnectcomfort.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://mytotalconnectcomfort.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmytotalconnectcomfort.com) ### Comment > This is the site I use to control my thermostat in my home so I need it to be working. I've been through extensive troubleshooting to fix this over the past few weeks and I had to take my computer to a specialist for $80 to determine that the issue is caused by AdGuard. I didn't think it was initially because I disabled AdGuard on this site and it still wouldn't load. However, he pointed out that if I completely exit AdGuard, then the site will load properly. My screenshots are of AdGuard still running on my computer, but with it disabled on the site, and the site will not load with "ERROR_CONNECTION_CLOSED". The second screenshot is after completely exiting AdGuard and not allowing it to run in the background and the site works normally. ``` Username: @JackLGM ``` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/5utfr3dywvocowow4g4gckw4ogoswkodlb2yh749tc.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/oyua20ko00g8o8880oko8sc4koc0wo0izgbu4ci99c.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.22.3 (5240) System version: | `Microsoft Windows NT 10.0.26200.0` Browser: | Edge License type: | paid AdGuard driver: | WFP Tracking protection: | **General settings**:
Block trackers,
Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header

**Tracking methods**:
Self-destructing third-party cookies (180)

**Browser API**:
Block WebRTC,
Block Push API,
Block Location API

**Windows tracking**:
Disable Windows Telemetry,
Turn off Advertising ID

**Miscellaneous**:
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests,
Protect against DPI DNS filtering: | server: `System`

comment.body:
Ok, I just did that and it said everything was already up to date.  I attempted to open the site again with AdGuard enabled on the site and with it disabled on the site.  It didn’t give the ERROR_CONNECTION_CLOSED, but in both cases the site just didn’t load.  The circle just kept spinning and it would not load.  I went ahead and exited AdGuard completely and tried the site again and it worked normally. 

 

From: Nguyen Nguyen ***@***.***> 
Sent: Wednesday, December 31, 2025 5:53 AM
To: AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters ***@***.***>
Cc: JackLGM ***@***.***>; Comment ***@***.***>
Subject: Re: [AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters] mytotalconnectcomfort.com (Issue #221469)

 

  <https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/23257168?s=20&v=4> ntnguyen1234 left a comment (AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters#221469) <https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/221469#issuecomment-3702058509> 

Can you update the filters and test again?

—
Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub <https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/221469#issuecomment-3702058509> , or unsubscribe <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AM7ZHACBIDTUOHJYEADMBGD4EO2LRAVCNFSM6AAAAACQLH5AKSVHI2DSMVQWIX3LMV43OSLTON2WKQ3PNVWWK3TUHMZTOMBSGA2TQNJQHE> .
You are receiving this because you commented.  <https://github.com/notifications/beacon/AM7ZHAA4A23M7UR4RQF6X3D4EO2LRA5CNFSM6AAAAACQLH5AKSWGG33NNVSW45C7OR4XAZNMJFZXG5LFINXW23LFNZ2KUY3PNVWWK3TUL5UWJTW4VDXA2.gif> Message ID: ***@***.*** ***@***.***> >

issue.title: www.bilibili.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [http://www.bilibili.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.bilibili.com) ### Comment > 这里的邮件的内容复制： > > 我已经找到问题了。 > 你们的报告错误界面，我也同步写了。 > > 首先，我要说明的是：不是过滤广告的问题，是页面注入的问题。 > 对比：chrome adguard广告拦截插件 vs adguard PC + 浏览器助手 / B站（www.bilibili.com）。 > 版本：windows 10 Pro 22H2 + chrome 143.0.7499.109（发邮件时最新）+ F12关闭了缓存 > 广告说明：实际上有2种以上广告。1、真实的广告，有 ad标识 。2、B站 UP的恰饭视频（简称 恰饭视频），偶尔会有标识（具体标识参考：5.png）。3、其他 > > 在前者（chrome adguard广告拦截插件），刷B站，不会有留白现象。 > 广告被拦截，白框被隐藏，很完美。 > > 在后者（adguard PC + 浏览器助手），会出现留白现象。 > 但大部分都是在 恰饭视频 被留白。 > > 问题复现很简单：ctrl + f5 刷新，在首页的6个视频中，左下角（图片 6.png）的那个视频经常会出现 恰饭视频，也就是留白。注意：不登录的情况下很难出现，疑似不登录减少广告投放。 > > 其次，你们说的方法，我都尝试过了。具体方法见邮件你们回复。 > 我在恢复默认设置后，发现问题得到了解决，并在开启 跟踪保护、安全浏览 等基础保护后，都是没问题的（图片 2/3.png）。 > 后来，我通过一个个手动添加过滤器，对比我之前的过滤器（图片 1.png），发现了问题出现在 【扰人的 - adguard 弹窗过滤器】 （图片 4.png）。 > > 也就是说，只要开启 【扰人的 - adguard 弹窗过滤器】，就会有留白现象，不开启则没有问题。 > 我不确定是否和我没有开启 DNS保护 有关，因为我使用了 OpenClash ，DNS是通过软路由解析，所以不能开启，也无法测试。 > > 问题已经找到， > 希望官方早日修复这个bug。 ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/3hkxqyz1js008kwk0sskoocsw848sk0lvgzzbj8yjk.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.22.3 (5240) System version: | `windows 10 Pro 22H2` Browser: | Chrome License type: | paid AdGuard driver: | WFP Tracking protection: | **General settings**:
Block trackers,
Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header

**Tracking methods**:
Self-destructing third-party cookies (180)

**Browser API**:
Block Push API,
Block Location API

**Windows tracking**:
Disable Windows Telemetry,
Turn off Advertising ID,
Disable Windows Defender automatic samples submission,
Disable WAP Push Message Routing Service

**Miscellaneous**:
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests DNS filtering: | disabled Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection,
AdGuard URL Tracking

Social widgets:
AdGuard Social Media

Annoyances:
AdGuard Cookie Notices,
AdGuard Other Annoyances,
AdGuard Widgets,
AdGuard Annoyances,
AdGuard Popups,
EasyList Cookie List

Language-specific:
AdGuard Chinese Custom filters: | `User rules (url: none)` Browsing Security: | enabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled Userscripts: | `AdGuard Extra (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js)`
`AdGuard Popup Blocker (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/popup-blocker/2.5/popupblocker.user.js)` Userstyles: | disabled ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?product_type=win&product_version=7.22.3+%285240%29&system_version=windows+10+Pro+22H2&browser=chrome&filters=2.3.4.17.18.21.22.224.14.19.241&custom_filters=User%2520rules%2520%28url%253A%2520none%29&dns_servers=System&userscripts=AdGuard%2520Extra%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%252Frelease%252Fadguard-extra%252F1.0%252Fadguard-extra.user.js%29%252C%250AAdGuard%2520Popup%2520Blocker%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%252Frelease%252Fpopup-blocker%252F2.5%252Fpopupblocker.user.js%29&dns.filters=1.15%252C%250AUser%2520rules%2520%28url%253A%2520none%29&dns.filters_enabled=true&dns.enabled=false&browsing_security.enabled=true&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=false&stealth.enabled=true&stealth.webrtc=false&stealth.push=true&stealth.location=true&stealth.flash=false&stealth.java=false&stealth.strip_url=true&stealth.hide_search_queries=true&stealth.DNT=true&stealth.x_client=true&stealth.dpi=false&stealth.third_party_cookies=180&stealth.disable_third_party_cache=false&stealth.block_third_party_auth=false&stealth.block_trackers=true&stealth.disable_wap_push_message_routing_service=true&stealth.disable_windows_defender=true&stealth.disable_windows_telemetry=true&stealth.turn_off_advertising_id=true&referrer=&win.wfp=true&license_type=paid&scheme_version=2&adblocking.enabled=true&dns.timeout=0&dns.fallback_mode=System&stealth.disable_windows_recall=true)

### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script)
[NSFW] [http://deltaporno.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fdeltaporno.com)
### Comment
> I am using AdGuard Family DNS (family.adguard-dns.com) as Private DNS on the entire Android device.
> Most adult websites are blocked, but this website (DeltaPorno.com) is still accessible.

